response.overview: Omid Djalili's 2015 stand-up show, released online for free in 2017, in return for a charity donation. Also features Andrew Jobbins and Martin Soan. Iranalamadingdong saw Omid Djalili travel the world in 2014/2015, discussing themes including relationships, the perils of celebrity and getting older.  This show was released online for free by Omid. He says, after you watch it: "I encourage you to go and make a donation straight to the Bobby Moore Fund, an excellent cause I've been privileged to work with many times in the past. The fund raises money for life-saving research into bowel cancer and increases public awareness of the disease."  Published  2017  Writer  Omid Djalili  Company  Bound and Gagged Comedy  Additional details  Production setting  Event  Camera set-up  Multi-camera  Picture  Colour  Broadcast details  First broadcast  Wednesday 1st November 2017 on Vimeo  Episode length  58 minutes  Recording details  Hammersmith Apollo
response.title: Omid Djalili - Iranalamadingdong
